data.title: Robert White Obituary 2008
data.meta_description: Robert F. White 1928 – 2008 Robert F. (Bob) White 79, of Gulf Breeze, FL died Saturday, February 23, 2008. He was born in Marion County, IN on August 18, 1928 to Walter and Gold...
data.text:
Robert F. White 1928 – 2008 Robert F. (Bob) White 79, of Gulf Breeze, FL died Saturday, February 23, 2008. He was born in Marion County, IN on August 18, 1928 to Walter and Golda (Ray) White. Bob graduated Magna Cum Laude from the University of Indianapolis in 1969 and earned an M.B.A. from Butler University in 1972. He retired from Navistar (formerly International Harvester) in 1987 where he was a Senior Systems Developer. After retirement, Bob continued working as a computer consultant out of his home. He is survived by his loving wife, Sally (Bennett) White after 34 years of marriage, Bob and Sally have three children: Claudia White, Stephanie (Doug) Gentry, and Dennis Hobson. Friends may call from 6:00 – 8:00 pm Friday at Rose Lawn Funeral Home on Gulf Breeze Parkway. You may view a tribute to Bob at www.roselawn-fh.com Funeral services will be conducted at 5:00 pm Saturday, March 1, 2008 at the funeral home. Rose Lawn Funeral Home, Gulf Breeze, Florida has been entrusted with arrangements.

Service

Celebration of Life Service

Rose Lawn Funeral Home

2942 Gulf Breeze Parkway

Gulf Breeze, FL 32563

Saturday, March 1, 2008

5:00 PM
